@graph.name: Gochugaru Baked Tofu, Melon, Veggie Skewers with Chili Lime Sauce - Vegan Richa

itemListElement.name: Gochugaru Baked Tofu, Melon, Veggie Skewers with Chili Lime Sauce

@graph.name: Gochugaru Baked Tofu, Melon, Pepper Veggie skewers with Chili Lime Sauce
@graph.description: Gochugaru Baked Tofu, Melon, Pepper Veggie skewers with Chili Lime Sauce. Summer Vegetable kabobs. Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 14 oz firm or extra firm tofu (pressed for 10 minutes, then cubed into large cubes)
2 to 3 tsp gochugaru pepper flakes ( or use other pepper flakes)
gochugaru and salt for the sprinkling
1/2 tsp gochugaru or red pepper flakes
1/4 tsp garlic powder (, add a clove of garlic minced as well for more flavor)

recipeInstructions.text: Cube the tofu and veggies into large pieces so that they dont fall off the skewers easily. Mix soy sauce, garlic, pepper flakes and salt in a bowl. Brush the mixture liberally on the tofu cubes and let chill to marinate for half an hour. Brush so that the pepper flakes are spread over all cubes. You can also sprinkle more gochugaru as needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Cube the tofu and veggies into large pieces so that they dont fall off the skewers easily. Mix soy sauce, garlic, pepper flakes and salt in a bowl. Brush the mixture liberally on the tofu cubes and let chill to marinate for half an hour. Brush so that the pepper flakes are spread over all cubes. You can also sprinkle more gochugaru as needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Then Skewer the tofu cubes, melon and peppers onto skewers. Sprinkle more gochugaru/pepper and salt on the melons and peppers.
recipeInstructions.name: Then Skewer the tofu cubes, melon and peppers onto skewers. Sprinkle more gochugaru/pepper and salt on the melons and peppers.

recipeInstructions.text: Grill on a grill skillet or grill, until tofu has nice grill marks. Turn the skewers around to have grill marks or on atleast 2 sides of the tofu. Serve as is or over salad, with sweet chili sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Grill on a grill skillet or grill, until tofu has nice grill marks. Turn the skewers around to have grill marks or on atleast 2 sides of the tofu. Serve as is or over salad, with sweet chili sauce.

@graph.keywords: gochugaru baked tofu, melon skewers, summer veggie skewers
